featured.text: Mounted in the two tall towers of the cathedral, Notre-Dame’s bells have been ringing for over 800 years.
On his way to the dump, the bell rang.
They have also rung in times of 28 and of mourning, announcing such events as royal weddings and coronations of kings, as well as funerals of heads of state.
This particular bell, ringing in F sharp, is considered one of the most harmonically beautiful in Europe.
The alarm rings even when it’s not set to go off.

other.text: When the main tree dies, the sprouts are then free to grow as full trees, forming a “fairy ring” of trees around the initial tree.
What does a “fairy ring” in the last paragraph refer to? (A) Circled tree trunks.

definition.zh_def: 環形物體，通常用於裝飾或象徵承諾的金屬圈。
definition.en_def: A circular band, typically made of metal, worn as an ornament or a symbol of commitment.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful diamond ring on her finger.
